attributes.action: MA Degrees from Oxford and Cambrigdge
attributes.additional_details:
Oxford and Cambridge Universities have a system of awarding MA degrees, without any further study or research, 20 terms after matriculation, on payment of a small fee.

We believe this to be fraudulent, since it misrepresents the persons academic achievement,
and is incompatible with the standard model
throughout the modern world.

We believe the government should make this practice illegal.
